all_text_timv: Medley (London, England : 1710) The Medley. London : Printed and sold by A. Baldwin, 1710-1712. 90 volumes ; 33 cm Semiweekly, Mar. 3-Aug. 1/4, 1712 Weekly, 1710-July 30/Aug. 6, 1711 text txt rdacontent microform h rdamedia microfilm reel hd rdacarrier No. 1 (Oct. 5, 1710)-no. 45 (July 30/Aug. 6, 1711) ; [New series] no. 1 (Mar. 3, 1712)-no. 45 (Aug. 1/4, 1712). Photo-reproduction by Oxford University Press; New series no. 45 is lacking. Edited by A. Maynwaring and J. Oldmixon. The first number appeared Oct. 5, 1710. Publication ceased with the 45th number, Aug. 6, 1711. It was revived Mar. 3, 1712, but only ran till Aug. 4, again 45 numbers. Great Britain Politics and government 1702-1714 Periodicals. Maynwaring, Arthur, 1668-1712, editor. Oldmixon, Mr. (John), 1673-1742, editor. Great Britain. England. London. English literary periodicals ; 22E. Early English newspapers ; 1065. Microfilm. Ann Arbor, Mich. : University Microfilms, 1954. 1 microfilm reel ; 35 mm. (English literary periodicals ; 22E). Microfilm. Woodbridge, Conn. : Research Publications, [1982]. 1 microfilm reel ; 35 mm. (Early English newspapers ; 1065). Filmed with: The Whig examiner. Microfilm. New Haven, Conn. : Yale University Library, Photographic Services. 1968. 1 microfilm reel ; 35 mm. Filmed with: The Moderator.
